com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.connection

Class PL2303Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.connection.AbstractConnection
      • com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.connection.PL2303Connection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPL2303Connection

    public class PL2303Connection
extends AbstractConnection
implements IPL2303Connection
    PL2303 connection class.

    need extend PL2303AbstractConnection and implements IPL2303Connection

    Author:
    Alvin Yang

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Description copied from interface: IPL2303Connection
        close local PL2303 connection.

        if want to power off meter, must call AbstractMeter.turnOffMeterOrBluetooth(int)

        call the method, only stop the local device(android phone) connection, not turn off local PL2303 driver.

        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface IPL2303Connection
